content:
/>
XIII.ii.5.C.1.b
.
Generating Listings of Veterans for Whom Data Is Required
The Austin Systems Development Center generates listings entitled
DECEASED VETERAN LISTING FOR STATION XXX
, grouped by regional office (RO), of cases required by the Air Force in connection with the study.
The listings are forwarded to the RO that the Beneficiary Identification and Records Locator Subsystem (BIRLS) indicates
has jurisdiction of the deceased Veteran’s claim folder, or
retired the deceased Veteran’s claim folder to a Federal records center (FRC).
Note
:  FRC cases appear on a separate listing entitled
FRC LISTING FOR STATION XXX
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section C - Information Requests for Research Purposes
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section C
